Poblano Toolbox

The Poblano Toolbox for MATLAB enables large-scale optimization of scalar-valued functions using first-order derivative information only.

Documentation

  • Toolbox Overview
  • Optimization Input Parameters
  • Optimization Output Parameters
  • Poblano Examples
  • Nonlinear Conjugate Gradient Optimization
  • Limited-Memory BFGS Optimization
  • Truncated Newton Optimization
  • Checking Gradient Calculations

Home Page

For more information and to subscribe to the mailing list, please visit the Poblano Toolbox homepage at https://software.sandia.gov/trac/poblano/.
